title: [1.14.2-1.12.X][Wool Pressure Plates——羊毛压力板]16色压力板~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2173204318 于 2019-8-6 09:22 编辑 

Wool Pressure Plates
羊毛压力板

Wool Pressure Plates adds pressure plates made out of every available colored wool. These new pressure plates act the same way as wooden pressure plates. They will give off a redstone signal when walked on, and when an item falls onto them.Additionally, they will negate a very tiny amount of fall damage.You can craft the plates with a wooden pressure plate and any color wool you like (shapeless).
主要功能:加入了16色羊毛压力板(作用方式与木质压力板相同)(减免极其微小的掉落伤害)合成配方如下[其余颜色相同]



DOWNLOAD[无汉化]作者要求原贴下载汉化下载下方补链https://share.weiyun.com/5reXafj

关于授权已经过授权
